headline: One Korea through the Gospel
headline_detail: Korea has long history over 4000 years. Korean peninsula is one. It was one and it should be one.
story_detail:
The 2B1 Foundation is a non-profit organization with a Reconciliation Ministry. It all started with a family living in Silicon Valley. 
 We focus on relating. We focus on beauty rather than the things of political or military conflict. We would like to emphasize that Korea are one by introducing the people, nature and food of Korea. For the past 70 years, we have lived seperately with our own cultural identity, but now we must come together. 
 We believe that true unity can only be achieved through the Gospel.

oneness.title: The Oneness
oneness.desc: We believe that only the Gospel can make perfect oneness.

reconciliation.title: Reconciliation
reconciliation.desc: We prioritize the Reconciliation Ministry which unites conflicting relationships, regions, and countries through the Gospel.

movement.title: Movement
movement.desc: We do a non-political movement. We carry out a practical and constructive ‘Unitifaction Movement’ such as education, cultural movement, and technology development.

support.title: Support us
support.detail:
Donate towards Korean unification to end suffering, promote peace, 
 and unlock economic potential for the entire Korean peninsula.
